name: Breeder: Homegrown
description:
An old man escapes from the clinic where he spent his whole life and returns home. He remembers his childhood. His toys. His monsters.

WASD or Arrows to move. E or Space to examine. I to open Inventory. Esc to open Menu.

by Outlands

http://outlands-games.com/

https://twitter.com/OutlandsGames

Music by Burai

https://soundcloud.com/burai

Breeder:Homegrown is part of a three game series. You can play the first instalment here:

http://outlands.itch.io/breeder

The three stories work independently from one another but take place in the same universe.

The upcoming game Breeders will be our biggest project to date and we want to provide more gameplay and a story that spans over several generations for a 10 to 20 hours RPG.

So, if you liked Breeder and Breeder:Homegrown and want to know more about what the breeders are, consider supporting us here or on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/Outlands

Thanks for playing!
